column10: quirk_description

column9: ワン・フォー・オール
column10: A transferable Quirk that stockpiles power and grants immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.
Secretes sweat with nitroglycerin-like properties from his hands and can ignite it on command to produce powerful explosions.
She can make any object weightless by touching them with the pads on her fingertips. Overuse of her Quirk will cause her to suffer from severe nausea.
Super speed and superhuman kicking strength via jet engines in his calves.
Enables him to generate ice from the right side of his body and fire from the left.
Enables him to harden his body.
Gives her frog-like abilities such as enhanced swimming and jumping, sticking to and climbing up walls, and a long prehensile tongue.
Enables her the ability to create any non-biological object from the lipids stored in her body as long as she knows its molecular structure.

He grows many small, highly adhesive grape-like balls on his head that he can remove and use as weapons. He can also use the balls as his personal trampolines, as they bounce off his body instead of sticking to him.
Enables him the ability to absorb and emit electricity.
Enables her to plug her extremely long earlobes into objects to hear minuscule sounds and vibrations from her surroundings or channel the sound of her own heartbeat in the form of sonic attacks.
Enables him to manifest and control a sentient shadow monster from his body that grows more powerful in the dark.
Enables her to secrete an acidic fluid from her body.
Enables him to fire a laser blast from his belly button.
Enables him to grow individual body organs at the tips of the four webbed tentacles growing from his shoulders.
Enables him to shoot cellophane tape from the tape dispenser-like organs on his elbows.
Grants him a thick prehensile tail.
Allows him to talk to animals.
Enhances his physical strength at the cost of his cognitive functions whenever he consumes sugar.
Makes her entire body invisible and gives her the ability to refract light.
Allows him to temporarily duplicate and use another person's Quirk by simply touching them. He can store four Quirks, but can only activate one at a time.
Enables her to enlarge her fists.
Gives her a head of vines instead of hair that she can extend and use in combat.
Gives him the ability to turn his skin to steel.
Enables him to soften anything that he touches.
At the site of an initial impact he can create a second impact, which he can activate anytime.
Allows him to physically connect anything he touches.
Enables him to solidify air into a wall or platform.
Allows him to rotate any part of his body at incredibly high speeds, similarly to a drill.
Enables him to excrete a glue-like liquid from seven eyeholes on his glue dispenser-shaped head.
Grants her the ability to telekinetically manipulate objects around her.
Grants him the ability to transform into a monstrous beast.
Enables her to change the size of any object she interacts with.
Enables him to form scales on his body for combat and other purposes. He can also shoot the scales.
Grants her the ability to create spores from her cells, allowing her to grow mushrooms from the surfaces of her surroundings.
Grants him the ability to produce large, sharp blades from all over his body.
Allows her to grow effectively gazelle-like horns on her head and control them.
Allows her to split her body into several pieces and control them telekinetically.
Grants him the ability to merge into anything that is black-colored and control it.
Allows him to manifest different onomatopoeias into reality in the form of katakana.
Allows her to zoom her vision to up to 5 kilometers.
Allows him to control those who answer his questions.
column12: Origionally - General Course. Transfered to - Hero Course

column10: Allows him to phase his body through anything solid, including the ground itself.
Gives him the characteristics and abilities of anything he eats.
Allows her to convert her stamina into energy and release it in the form of spiral shockwaves.
Allows him to control the wind
Allows her to create illusions that form with a mist-like substance that she emits from her mouth.
Allows him to mold others into restrained globs of flesh.
Allows him to lengthen and manipulate his body hair.
Allows him to channel powerful vibrations through any surface he touches with his hands.
Allows her to retract her body into herself like a turtle
Allows him to make any object he rubs or kneads with his hands extremely hard, although it does not work on living beings.
Grants him the ability to throw objects with incredible accuracy and change their trajectory in mid-air.
Allows her to temporarily boost her intelligence by drinking tea and closing her eyes. The strength of the intelligence boost depends on the type of tea she drinks.
Enables him to create a gas that temporarily turns those who inhale it into zombies. However, he is not immune to his own Quirk.
Allows her to create a holographic page which can be used to locate and detect people.
Enables his sweat to create a bright flash of light and sound on impact.
Allows her to paralyze her targets for three seconds by looking them straight in the eye.
Enables him to disintegrate whatever he touches with his fingers and anything connected to it.

column9: オール・フォー・ワン
column10: Allows him to both steal and bestow Quirks, as well as wield multiple Quirks at once.
Allows him to generate a dark purple fog from his body and use it to create weaponized long-ranged portals.

column4: 殻木 球大 博士
column10: Grants him an extended lifespan and makes him look younger than he actually is.
An immensely powerful kaiju-sized villain who has multiple Quirks and is deeply loyal to All For One.
Allows him to cause minor amnesia to a person by making physical contact with their head.
Allows him to generate and control a stronger variant of Endeavor's Hellflame, possessing a high cold resistance but unable to withstand his own flames for a prolonged amount of time.
She is able to assume the physical appearance of another after drinking  that person's blood. The quirk later evolved to allow her to use the Quirk of whoever she turns into.
The Quirk allows him to create copies of anything he touches, including himself once overcoming his personal issues.
Allows him to instantly shrink down anything in a spherical area into a small marble without actually damaging it.
Gives him the appearance and abilities of a gecko.
Allows her to magnetize others within an area around herself.
Allows him to enlarge the muscle fibers beneath his skin, granting him immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.
Allows him to generate vast amounts of a toxic sleeping gas from his body, he is not immune to his own Quirk.
Allows him to lengthen, sharpen, and manipulate his teeth into webs of powerful blades.

A highly advanced and sentient Nomu made from an unnamed street punk who attacks Endeavor and Hawks in Kyushu. Hood openly showed some signs of obedience and loyalty to his master. He spoke with a stutter and broken grammar.ep 87 He is revealed to possess six different Quirks and is able to severely injure Endeavor, before the latter incinerates him with his ultimate super move Prominence Burn.
A small Nomu with a cable-like bottom that is owned by Daruma and has the ability to teleport people by spraying a goo that makes its recipient a medium for the teleportation.
Grants him the ability to convert his stress and anger into raw power, which turns him into a hulking monster and significantly enhances his strength.
Allows him to boost the physical and mental abilities of his subordinates from his voice.
Allows him to take a human-sized object and turn it into an exact lookalike of any given person, which he can then control like a puppet.
Allows her to turn anything she touches into a bomb.
Allows him to freely control all nearby ice.
Possesses an unnamed sliding Quirk.

enables him to disassemble anything he touches, as well as reassemble it in any configuration he desires. He can also use his Quirk to fuse himself with others, which enables him to use their Quirks, and heal himself of any injuries he sustains in combat.
Enables him to slow down the movements of anything he hits with his clock-hand-like hair.
Allows him to transfer his own body and mind into solid objects, which he can then manipulate and control like his actual body.
Enables him to force people to answer his questions truthfully.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows him to absorb the stamina of his adversaries, simultaneously strengthening himself and weakening his opponents.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows him to telekinetically steal any objects that his target possesses.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows him to grow sharp, durable crystals all over his body.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows his teeth to easily chew through and consume any solid substance, no matter how durable it is.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Enables him to rotate his shoulders at extreme speeds, allowing him to attack his targets with a near-endless barrage of bullet punches.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows him to create a dome-shaped forcefield around himself and his allies.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Enables him to subject anyone near him to severe dizziness, knocking off their sense of balance and putting them in a state similar to being drunk.
column13: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

column10: Allows him to paralyze a person for a certain period of time by ingesting their blood.
Allows him to bestow the property of elasticity to anything he touches.
Allows her to boost the power of whomever she loves the most by declaring her love to them (although she is only able to activate her Quirk once a day).
Allows him to control and manipulate any lane lines that are painted on the road.
Grants her the ability to transform her right forearm into a rifle at will. She uses her hair to create ammunition.

column9: 金属操作 and 筋肉増強
column10: Enables him to reshape and manipulate all types of metal. All For One also gave Wolfram the Quirk, Muscle Augmentation that enables him to increase his muscle mass.

Enables him to control the weather. In addition, Nine can also steal the Quirks of anyone and constant use of them can exhaust him, causing Nine to wear a special life-support system that pumps special drugs in him.
Enables him to reflect all types of energy, including any attack and its effects, back to the user; as well as storing it for later.
Allows her to morph her left hand into a bow, as well as being able to control the object she shoots out of it. However, she cannot create her own ammunition.
Allows him to create iron balls (of which he can also control the size of, to an extent) and shoot them from his knuckles.
A villain duo made up of two twin brothers - Their Quirk allows each of them to manifest flexible swords from their arms and shoulders.
Allows him to create a powerful water current twist from his fingertips and horns.
Gives him powerful pyrokinetic abilities. He is immune to other flames, and can easily control the shape and temperature of the blaze as well.
Grants him a pair of red feathered wings that allow him to fly at high speeds. He can also detach his feathers to use as blades or telekinetically control them from a distance.
Allows him to freely control fiber in clothes.
Gives her rabbit-like features such as superhuman leg strength and big rabbit-like ears.
Allows him to grow stone-like hexagon-shaped shields from his body.
Enables her to transform into a western dragon.

column6: オールマイト - 平和の象徴
column9: ワン・フォー・オール
column10: A transferable Quirk that stockpiles power and grants immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.
Gives him anthropomorphic abilities and superhuman intelligence.

Enables him to nullify another person's Quirk within his line of vision until he blinks. He can use his Quirk on multiple targets; it remains active, even if he looks elsewhere (as long as he doesn't blink).
Amplifies his voice using a jukebox-like collar.
Allows him to control his blood after it leaves his body. He can spread the blood out to form a variety of constructs.
Allows her to heal others' injuries by kissing them.
Allows her to produce a sleep-inducing fragrance from her body.
Allows him to control concrete.
Summons a black hole with her fingers that turns anything it sucks in into dust.
Allows him to spew out an ectoplasm-like dust from his helmet that can form into a clone of himself.
Allows him to alter the trajectory of his bullets.
Gives him metallic claws at the ends of his fingers, which allow him to dig and burrow underground.

column6: 猟犬ヒーローハウンドドッグ
column10: Gives him the appearance of a dog.
Forces her targets to burst into uncontrollable laughter that dulls their motor skills and impairs their cognitive abilities.

column10: Allows her to advise and instruct multiple people at once through mental transmission.
Allows her to freely manipulate the ground.
Allows her to observe and monitor up to 100 people at a time.
Allows him to stretch and bend his body.
Enables him to manipulate the thinness of his body. He can use his Quirk to move around quickly, slip through tight spaces, and pierce targets by folding himself into sharp shapes.
Gives him the ability to manipulate his tree-like limbs.
Allows her to grow to a gigantic height.

Allows him to see a person's future.

column10: Allows him to use his fat to absorb the impact from collisions.
Enables him to lock any non-living item in a position
Allows him to control water.
Allows him to shoot air from the soles of his feet.

column10: Allows him to release propulsion jets from his elbows and shoot himself forward at turbo speed.

column10: Grants him long centipede-like limbs with agonizing poison.
Allows her to make bubbles filled with an aroma that she has smelled at least once before.

column6: サンドヒーロー スナッチ
column10: Enables him to turn the upper half of his body into sand and control it
column13: Other - Pro Hero and a bodyguard of the Police Force

column10: Allows her to weaponize her fire-like hair.
column13: Other - Pro Hero and one of over thirty sidekicks who work at the Endeavor Agency

column14: Izuku's mother. She has an unnamed quirk that allows her to draw small objects to her with telekinesis-like power.

A young boy who lost his Hero parents the Water Hose duo to Muscular and was taken in by the Pussycats due to Mandalay being his aunt. His Quirk 'Water Gun' allows him to release a splash of water from his hands.

A freelance journalist who sought out All Might's successor for personal reasons. His Quirk 'Whole-Body Lens' allows him to manifest camera lenses on any part of his body and print the photographs from his chest.

The young granddaughter of the Shie Hassaikai's former crime boss. Her Quirk 'Rewind' enables her to reverse a living individual's body back to a previous state, allowing her to make them younger, heal them of their injuries, and undo any of their bodily modifications.
Endeavor's wife and the mother of their four children. She has a powerful ice Quirk that has yet to be shown.
Shoto's older sister. She works as an elementary school teacher and has an ice Quirk like her mother.
Shoto's older brother. He is a university student majoring in medicine and has an ice Quirk like his mother.

Endeavor's loyal fan. Hiroshi is rather supportive of Endeavor, notably when he spoke out to the public that they still need to believe in Endeavor for protecting society from powerful villains like High-End.

column4: デヴィット・シールド
column14: David Shield is a scientist at I-Island, All Might's old friend, and the father of Melissa Shield.
Melissa is the Quirkless daughter of David Shield.

A little boy living on Nabu Island. His Quirk 'Cell Activation' allows its user to activate the cells in anyone's body through touch which increases regeneration, recovery time, and improves their physical condition.
A little girl living on Nabu Island who is Katsuma's older sister. Her Quirk 'Hologram' allows her to create holograms of anything she wishes.
His Quirk 'Soul' manifests as a small, bird-like animal named Pino, who changes facial expressions based on how Rody is feeling due to a link to his soul. Rody is also a resident of Otheon.
A small, bird-like animal who changes facial expressions based on how Rody is feeling due to a link to his soul.
